programme.title: Beautiful Destroyer
programme.desc: Leigh tragically witnesses her mother's murder by the very person who raises her. She grows up to become a formidable assassin, battling to conceal her identity from the love of her life.

programme.title: Masked
programme.desc: After her darkest secrets are exposed by those closest to her, this famed celebrity must make a difficult choice; family or fame?

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part: Journey To The Cross
programme.desc: As old friends reunite, a young woman's life is thrown into chaos. They turn to faith for answers.

programme.title: The SZN
programme.desc: Up-and-coming entertainment mogul Roman Perry's career crumbles as his brother's crimes surface, entangling him in a family web of secrets and lies.

programme.title: Full Moon
programme.desc: Will she defy tradition and emerge victorious or succumb to the pressure of family expectations? Follow her journey of survival through love, conflict, and self-discovery.

programme.title: Eater of Lies
programme.desc: Bekky's life spirals out of control when her father's extreme makeover of their home leads to a shocking discovery of a sex tape, exposing the dark secrets of her dysfunctional family.

programme.title: Clunkers
programme.desc: Ritchie's setback leads to an unexpected journey in the world of used car salesmanship.

programme.title: No Shade
programme.desc: After experiencing colorism in several personal and professional encounters, Jade realises she has to embrace her inherent beauty to find a happy ever after.

programme.title: Naked
programme.desc: A game of "Never Have I Ever" prompts college roommates to confront tough issues around black womanhood including colorism, codependency, competition, and body image.

programme.title: 1040 Not So EZ
programme.desc: An adventurous pursuit of wealth takes unexpected turns as friends challenge authority and fate together.

programme.title: Under His Control
programme.desc: Destiny tries to piece her life together after a once-blissful marriage to Corey leaves her abadoned and heartbroken.

programme.title: Beautiful Destroyer
programme.desc: Leigh tragically witnesses her mother's murder by the very person who raises her. She grows up to become a formidable assassin, battling to conceal her identity from the love of her life.

programme.title: Ben and Ara
programme.desc: Ara, a brilliant Muslim woman, is head over heels in love with Ben, an agnostic. Can they unite their families despite their cultural differences?

programme.title: Royal Glory
programme.desc: A father races against time to save his sickly daughter but an evil maid has other plans.
